languages.text: "Что касается Немезита — уверена, он скоро вновь проявит себя. Я разошлю агентов по всем палубам, и в следующий раз мы будем опережать его на шаг, а не он — нас".
languages.translation_comment:
МД
анимация отдает честь и уходит
Финалим Obj_ArrestConfessor, выдаем Obj_WaitForReport
уходят все, кроме игрока и Кибеллы

МД
анимация отдает честь и уходит
Финалим Obj_ArrestConfessor, выдаем Obj_WaitForReport
уходят все, кроме игрока и Кибеллы

languages.text: "I will send agents to every deck. The next time Nemesite rears his head — which, I am certain, will happen sooner rather than later — we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."
languages.original_text: "Что касается Немезита — уверена, он скоро вновь проявит себя. Я разошлю агентов по всем палубам, и в следующий раз мы будем опережать его на шаг, а не он — нас".

traits.locale_text: "I will send agents to all decks, and next time we will be one step ahead of him and not the other way round."
"I will send agents to all decks, and next time we will be one step ahead of him and not the other way round."
"I shall send agents to every deck. The next time he rears his head, we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."
"I shall send agents to every deck. The next time he rears his head, we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."
"I will send agents to every deck. The next time Nemesite rears his head — which, I am certain, will happen sooner rather than later — we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."
"I will send agents to every deck. The next time Nemesite rears his head — which, I am certain, will happen sooner rather than later — we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."

languages.text: "Ich werde Agenten auf jedes Deck schicken. Wenn Nemesit sich das nächste Mal zeigt – was sicherlich eher früher als später passieren wird –, dann werden wir ihm einen Schritt voraus sein und nicht er uns."
languages.original_text: "I will send agents to every deck. The next time Nemesite rears his head — which, I am certain, will happen sooner rather than later — we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Agenten auf jedes Deck schicken. Wenn Nemesit sich das nächste Mal zeigt – was sicherlich eher früher als später passieren wird –, dann werden wir ihm einen Schritt voraus sein und nicht er uns."

languages.text: «Enviaré agentes a todas las cubiertas. La próxima vez que Nemesitio asome su fea cabeza (y seguro que acaba haciéndolo antes de lo que sospechamos), iremos un paso por delante suyo, y no al contrario».
languages.original_text: "I will send agents to every deck. The next time Nemesite rears his head — which, I am certain, will happen sooner rather than later — we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."

traits.locale_text: «Enviaré agentes a todas las cubiertas. La próxima vez que Nemesitio asome su fea cabeza (y seguro que acaba haciéndolo antes de lo que sospechamos), iremos un paso por delante suyo, y no al contrario».

languages.text: 「全デッキに使いを送ります。次にネメサイトが牙を剥き始めた時のために…遅かれ早かれ必ず起こることです…我々が一歩先を行って、妨害しましょう」
languages.original_text: "I will send agents to every deck. The next time Nemesite rears his head — which, I am certain, will happen sooner rather than later — we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."

traits.locale_text: 「全デッキに使いを送ります。次にネメサイトが牙を剥き始めた時のために…遅かれ早かれ必ず起こることです…我々が一歩先を行って、妨害しましょう」

languages.text: “涅墨斯特迟早还会动手，我要把我的特工派到每层甲板。这样等他下次再有动作的时候，我们就会领先他一步，而不是像这样被动挨打。”
languages.original_text: "I will send agents to every deck. The next time Nemesite rears his head — which, I am certain, will happen sooner rather than later — we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."

traits.locale_text: “涅墨斯特迟早还会动手，我要把我的特工派到每层甲板。这样等他下次再有动作的时候，我们就会领先他一步，而不是像这样被动挨打。”

languages.text: « Je vais déployer des agents sur tous les ponts. La prochaine fois que Némésite se manifestera, ce qui ne saurait tarder, nous aurons une longueur d'avance sur lui, et non pas l'inverse. »
languages.original_text: "I will send agents to every deck. The next time Nemesite rears his head — which, I am certain, will happen sooner rather than later — we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais déployer des agents sur tous les ponts. La prochaine fois que Némésite se manifestera, ce qui ne saurait tarder, nous aurons une longueur d'avance sur lui, et non pas l'inverse. »

languages.text: "Tüm güvertelere ajanlar göndereceğim. Nemezit başını çıkardığı an, ki bunun çok yakın zamanda olacağına eminim, onun bir adım önünde olan biz olacağız, tersi değil."
languages.original_text: "I will send agents to every deck. The next time Nemesite rears his head — which, I am certain, will happen sooner rather than later — we will be one step ahead of him, and not the other way round."
